name: Volter Co.
overview:
Volter Co. its a NYC tech company specialized in the development of groundbreaking robotic devices based in the integration of Artificial Vision and Processing Algorithms with a high concept of Organic Design with the purpose of offer to the consumers high tech products in which the intuitive integration with the environment by the user stands.

Created with the object of consolidate the idea of the commercial distribution of a way-out gadget for the new era market of the displayed information , based on the advantages of the projection and gesture analysis platforms the team has been able to set the processing tools that make possible the natural process of interaction between the client and his scenery.
